title: (x) Looking for a font called Accurate - Akkurat {Rainer}
content:
Is anyone familiar with a typeface called Accurate. I have seen it in a few places now, but I can't seem to track it down. If you search for it with Google the results are all about accurate typefaces.  
Any ideas about who created it, please let me know.  
Thanks  
Jon
author: Jon cdt

comments.content: How does it look like? Maybe you are looking for [Akkurat](http://web.archive.org/web/20110325000616/http:/www.lineto.com/) from lineto, in the category "textfonts"

It looks just like Akkurat. Thanks for the reply.  
Jon
